message.body: Paige asked & would love it if Grace could join us for dinner at Zio's on Friday for her Bday, we would pick her up between 5-5:30?! No Gift Please!!
That would be great. Grace will want to get her a gift.
I know but it's not needed:-) Paige will be so happy Grace gets to join us!!
Thought so, Grace wanted to hang out with her tonight but I was pretty sure she was busy
We will be home hopefully by 5:30?? If the photographer is with it!
I will get our errands done right after school and then Paige could come over after about six if that works
